header.p1: Looking for the best solution to renovate your three-room apartment in Rome and its surroundings? EvoHome is ready to meet all your needs, with over 17 years of experience in the construction and renovation sector. We offer you a complete, reliable, and personalized service to transform your three-room apartment into a unique and comfortable living environment that fully meets your expectations.
header.p2: Your home is the heart of your daily life, and at EvoHome, we understand that well. That’s why we strive to provide high-quality renovation solutions starting from €50,000, ensuring improvements to every aspect of your three-room apartment. Operating in Rome and nearby areas, EvoHome is the ideal choice for those seeking professionalism, experience, and customer-oriented service. Offering a minimum 3-year warranty on results, we are a trusted reference in the industry, ensuring reliable and long-term investments.

process.p: Our specialist performs accurate on-site measurements. If the project involves reconstruction, we determine which walls can be modified while ensuring compliance with current regulations and maximum safety.
